Class RangeInputSplit

    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputSplit
    @Deprecated
public class RangeInputSplit
extends RangeInputSplit
implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputSplit
    Deprecated.
    since 2.0.0; Use org.apache.accumulo.hadoop.mapred instead from the accumulo-hadoop-mapreduce.jar
    The Class RangeInputSplit. Encapsulates an Accumulo range for use in Map Reduce jobs.
